applicability.title: Learning Plan: Basic Bike Awareness Training

section.title: Learning Objectives
section.paragraph: This learning plan details the development and implementation of a Basic Bike Awareness training program for couriers. The goal is to improve bike maintenance skills, reducing downtime and improving service reliability.

list.item: Problem Statement: Identifying the need for improved bike maintenance skills.
Learning Objectives: Detailed learning goals for the training.
Curriculum: A breakdown of the training modules.
Instructional Methods: The techniques used to deliver the training.
Evaluation Methods: How the effectiveness of the training will be measured.
Implementation Plan: A timeline and resource allocation for the training.

subsection.title: 2. Problem Statement
subsection.paragraph: Bike couriers often experience delays due to mechanical issues. This impacts delivery times and customer satisfaction. A lack of basic maintenance skills contributes to these issues. This training aims to address this gap.

list.item: All bike couriers within the organization.
Assumed skill level: Basic bike operation knowledge.

subsection.title: 4. Curriculum
subsection.paragraph: The training program will consist of a computer-based module combined with hands-on practice.

list.item: Computer-Based Training (CBT): Interactive modules with visuals, animations, and knowledge checks.
Hands-on Practice: Practical exercises where couriers apply what they've learned on actual bikes.
Demonstrations: Instructors will demonstrate key procedures.
Q&A Sessions: Opportunities for couriers to ask questions and receive clarification.
Surveys: Collect feedback on the training content and delivery methods.
Surveys: Assess knowledge gained and confidence in performing maintenance tasks.
Assessment Results: Evaluate performance on hands-on exercises.
Monitor improvement in on-time delivery rates.
Conduct a pilot training session with a small group of couriers.
Gather feedback and make necessary revisions.
Track performance metrics and gather feedback to continuously improve the training program.
Players/Plug-ins: Adobe Flash Player, Adobe Acrobat Reader.
File Size: Optimized to minimize download times (under 100KB per file where possible).

subsection.title: 9. Intervention Implementation
subsection.paragraph: The intervention will be implemented through the creation and delivery of the combined CBT and hands-on training program.

subsection.title: 10. Performance Evaluation
subsection.paragraph: The effectiveness of the training will be evaluated using formative surveys, summative surveys, and analysis of performance metrics.
